    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(int xP,
            int yP,
            char Elm)
        Creates a Character of type Hero with the given positions as parameters,and a char to represent it in the map
        Parameters:
        xP - Hero matrix position - Line
        yP - Hero matrix position - Column
        Elm - Char that represents the Hero in the matrix

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update(Map currentmap,
                      char move,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Character> enemies)
        Updates the Hero status and movement in the game by checking colisions with the enemies of the level, with the key and the door
        Parameters:
        currentmap - the map where the hero is being updated
        move - WASD character to represent the movement the hero is trying to make
        enemies - an arraylist of Characters, where all the enemies of the Level that the hero is playing are stored(theres is only more than one enemie in an OgreLevel)
        Returns:
        true if the hero could move through the map successfully, false otherwise
